document.title: Nutrition through injury
document.source: Case Study extracted from Witty, Pask & Buckingham
document.section:
Nutrition through injury Example based on a female, 46 years, 1.70m, 62kg
She has two main concerns about her nutrition during this time: Dietary assessment:
The focus of the intervention: Cara Slossworks with you and your physio to recovery as quickly as possible by ensuring your nutrition is right. For moreÂ informationclick here. Disclaimer:Case study examples are highly specific to the individual, goals set may not be right for anyone else, even if the presentation sounds similar to you.Individualised nutrition assessment is key!
